entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as resuming his pacing.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, suggesting places where the object might be left.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: A village near Hogwarts, suggested by Hermione as a possible location.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school that Harry and his friends attend, ruled out as a possible location.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, mentioned as knowing how to get into the Shrieking Shack.

entities.name: shrieking shack
entities.description: A location in Hogsmeade that is rarely visited, but Snape knows how to enter.

relationships.description: Harry rules out Hogwarts as a possible location for the object.
Hermione suggests Hogsmeade as a possible location for the object.
Snape knows how to get into the Shrieking Shack.
